TopicTitle: How you feel when you receive reputation from a dev

Articles.Content:
Have you already received reputation from a dev?

Today I've received rep from Kasper and I thought "OMG A DEV GAVE ME REP !!!" ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

And you ? Have you received reputation from a dev?

![Eazhx1q.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Eazhx1q.jpg)

(the comment he wrote in French means : "Very good sir")

Kasper's not really a dev, though he is a Squad employee. But yeah, rep from a Squad person is pretty gratifying. I've been lucky enough to get some from Kasper a few times, and once from Rowsdower when he was Community Manager.
I once got some rep from Sal. It was awesome.
I think the very first rep I got was from a mod, for clarifying (paraphrasing) his question to someone. I don't remember who though....

I'm sure I've gotten rep from Squad employees, though from devs I'm not so sure. Maybe Nova did it once.

The main problem is you can only look so far back... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

![IpkIrHr.png](http://i.imgur.com/IpkIrHr.png)

I have some from sal\_vager, and a few other moderators ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I also have some from Ted. How I got it is a seecret. Ted rep best rep. And it counts as ten rep points (as do Kasper's, sal\_vager's, and Supernovy's - being a forum admin has its privileges).

> 
> I also have some from Ted. How I got it is a seecret. Ted rep best rep. And it counts as ten rep points (as do Kasper's, sal\_vager's, and Supernovy's - being a forum admin has its privileges).

Pure inflation, if you ask me. At least we now know your green bars are worth less ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> I think the very first rep I got was from a mod, for clarifying (paraphrasing) his question to someone. I don't remember who though....

It was from Rowsdower, "You pretty much translated the heart of my question." It was your fourth rep comment though, not your first.

> 
> I'm sure I've gotten rep from Squad employees, though from devs I'm not so sure. Maybe Nova did it once.
> The main problem is you can only look so far back... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/IpkIrHr.png](http://i.imgur.com/IpkIrHr.png)

You got rep from Nova back in February, no comment though and I can't see for which post. (I forgot Nova in my list above, he's repped me a couple of times).

That color scheme is...something.

> 
> I'm sure I've gotten rep from Squad employees, though from devs I'm not so sure. Maybe Nova did it once.
> The main problem is you can only look so far back... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/IpkIrHr.png](http://i.imgur.com/IpkIrHr.png)

Man, that red makes me think you got a load of negative rep...\*looks over shoulder\*

> 
> Man, that red makes me think you got a load of negative rep...\*looks over shoulder\*

He's been banned. Sorry. \*checks six to see if any senior mods are watching\* Although I'm sure he could come back given the proper...instigation.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-17T22:36:14Z" title="06/17/2015 10:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 17, 2015</time> by DuoDex**

I don't think I have! *Yet...*

Curious to know who I first got rep from.
I enjoy moderator rep to be sure. I cant say I remember Dev rep.

> 
> He's been banned. Sorry. \*checks six to see if any senior mods are watching\* Although I'm sure he could come back given the proper...instigation.

What are we talking about? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

I'm banned? Since when? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I got rep from a mod because I used the report button.

I am NOT part of the problem! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

If I answer this question, it would imply I've gotten reputation from a Dev, which I have not, therefore any answer I provide is invalid, including this one.

Don't think about it.

> 
> Curious to know who I first got rep from.

Thomas988, "Welcome!"

> 
> Thomas988, "Welcome!"

Oooh! Is that a moderator-only feature or is it for all users? Because I'd love to use it. XD
It's a feature in the moderator control panel, we can see old rep comments but oddly not which posts they were given for.

> 
> It's a feature in the moderator control panel, we can see old rep comments but oddly not which posts they were given for.

Huh. Strange. Shouldn't that be a relatively simple fix?

EDIT:

Presuming you can edit that bit of software.

It's vBulletin, not sure how editable the control panel is for the admins. I am not allowed to edit forum software, which is good because with my programming skill I'd make April 2013 look like a minor outage. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Lets see...I've gotten rep from supernovy, and maybe kasper and rowsy. Not sure though, as it was forever ago. Like. Remember Rowsdower's joke about wearing a fireproof suit? Well, those reps were from the community upset before that. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Benefits of doing Squadcast Summaries - huge amounts of rep from loads of people ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I know I've gotten rep from moderators which always makes me feel warm and fuzzy but KSP devs? I.. honestly don't remember and now I feel bad :/

I got some rep from Red Iron Crown, that was pretty awesome. AND it was for a picture.

EDIT:

I remember now, I got rep TWICE from RIC, the first time in the 1.0 hype train!
I don't think I got any rep from a mod.

Err.. I only got repped by a mod once - from Vanamonde , about a post in the 2015 "April" fools prank.

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹I honestly thought that was brutally hilarious.. \*starts running away
